text: The men's shot put event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 19 October. A 7257g (Senior implement) shot was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Rutger Smith ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Ivan Yushkov
